item.title: About
item.author: vlas.sokolov@mpg-alumni.de (Vlas Sokolov)
item.description: img {border-radius: 55%;} A data scientist, software developer, and an astrophysicist (not necessarily in that order) based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy tinkering with data analysis, statistical methods, and data visualization. Work Experience Data Scientist (2020 - current) Solita Data Engineer (2018 - 2020) INNOSPOT GmbH Doctoral Researcher (2014 - 2018) Max Planck Institute for Extraterrestrial Physics
